info.title: Frank Bot (OpenAI)
info.description: OpenAI Actions interface for Frank Bot. Some resource families use a multiplexed 'action' parameter to stay within OpenAI's 30-endpoint limit. The canonical API is at /actions/openapi.json.

get.summary: Search contacts by name, email, or phone
Get execution details (output, git diff, costs)
Current time (derives timezone from latest Swarm check-in)

get.description: Multiplexed calendar endpoint. action: listEvents, createEvent, updateEvent, deleteEvent, listCalendars
action: send (recipient, message), list (limit, contact, phone, direction)
action: send, messages, chats, sendPhoto, status, botSend
action: search, get, query, count, dateParse, diagnostics
action: status, screen, screenshot, tap, type, swipe, key, launch, wake, findTap

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text to type, or element text (findTap)

get.description: action: create (goal, app), get (task_id), list (status, limit), cancel (task_id)
action: thermostatStatus, thermostatSetRange, updateApps, security, reboot, storage, clearCache, battery, audit
action: list, create, get, cancel, messages, approve, brief, stats
action: create, list, get, send, end
action: list, create, get, update, delete, run, runInline, taskGet, taskList
